title: bugs that stall physics simulation for long-time-no-motion objects is fixed.
message:
bugs that stall physics simulation for long-time-no-motion objects is fixed.
bugs that fails reading model with zero rigid body or joint is fixed.
fix physics stability when physics on/off.

title: Physics simulation is updated to follow bone to physics at 60Hz.
message:
Physics simulation is updated to follow bone to physics at 60Hz.
NullPointerException bugs for OneSkinning model with more than 48 bones is fixed.

title: Physics On/Off menu is added.
message:
Physics On/Off menu is added.
Playback control interface is updated.

title: physics initialization code for seeking is fixed.
message: physics initialization code for seeking is fixed.

title: physics simulation using bullet is added.
message: physics simulation using bullet is added.

title: Bullet 2.78 under ZLIB license is included for physics simulation.
message: Bullet 2.78 under ZLIB license is included for physics simulation.

message: bug that fails loading .x files is fixed.

message: add header in .xc file

title: XParser supports reading normal vector and generating normal vector.
message:
XParser supports reading normal vector and generating normal vector.
Change to default toon texture if model have a non-existing toon texture file name.

message: memory usage in XParser is reduced(INDEX).

cache for X file is generated for faster model loading.

message: Index size is changed to Integer for .x file(more vertices)

title: XParser supports multiple mesh.
message: XParser supports multiple mesh.

title: set the music players to be looping.
message:
set the music players to be looping.
(experimental) loading .x file is enabled.
marging materials having same color and texture is implemented but disabled because there is no performance implovement.
avoid crush when loading non-existing textures.

title: add shader for shadow but not implemented completely.
message: add shader for shadow but not implemented completely.

title: add RenderSenario class to modify rendering scripts on-the-fly.
message: add RenderSenario class to modify rendering scripts on-the-fly.

title: alpha test is enabled for materials with texture has alpha = 0.
message:
alpha test is enabled for materials with texture has alpha = 0.
diffusion filter is implemented but disabled due to lower quality and lower performance.
LoD using polygon simplification is implemented but disabled due to poor looking.

title: separate render between non-alpha materials and alpha materials.
message:
separate render between non-alpha materials and alpha materials.
add shader for alpha test but disabled yet because of performance problem.

title: search /sdcard/.MikuMikuDroid to avoid MediaScanner.
message: search /sdcard/.MikuMikuDroid to avoid MediaScanner.

title: view-frustum culling with bone motions is fully implemented.
message: view-frustum culling with bone motions is fully implemented.

title: view-frustum culling with bone matrix is implemented.
message:
view-frustum culling with bone matrix is implemented.
reduce memory usage if the number of bone is less than 48 to avoid reconstructing materials.

title: Add view frustum culling but bone matrix is not supported.
message:
Add view frustum culling but bone matrix is not supported.
Prevent loading whole picture when reading picture size.

title: reading a background picture is supported.
message:
reading a background picture is supported.
reading wav, m4a, ogg, 3gp is supported.

title: add sensor code but disabled.
message: add sensor code but disabled.

message:
cache OOM at initialization.
delete texture when selecting "initialize"
reduce rename_index size to half.
scale texture when OOM.

title: GL_REPEAT in texture and delete uv modification code in PMDParser.
message:
GL_REPEAT in texture and delete uv modification code in PMDParser.
rescale texture from NPOT to POT for the phone that has not support of NPOT texture.
vs float precision is highp due to Z-fighting.
MIPMAP when supporting NPOT.
avoid crash in alpha-extract code while reading non-bmp texture.

title: texture uv wrapping is fixed but still has some bugs.
message:
texture uv wrapping is fixed but still has some bugs.
32-bit bmp with alpha is supported.

title: limit max texture size to GPU spec.
message:
limit max texture size to GPU spec.
texture resizing now 1/2.

title: Model serialization is implemented but not executed because serialize is very slow.
message:
Model serialization is implemented but not executed because serialize is very slow.
Sharing Material.rename_index between Material makes file size and memory area small.
It results in speed up.
It will be implemented later.
